45 Romney Street, Charleston, SC 29403
Visit us at map marker pin About Us 
Step into Red Palm Tavern, a soon to be Charleston institution where American tavern charm meets modern sports bar energy. Unwind from 11am to midnight, Tuesday through Sunday, with a menu influenced by the warmth of a wood-fired grill. Soak up the Charleston sunshine on the patio, challenge friends to billiards or darts, and catch the game on one of 15 TVs or the massive LED screen. Red Palm Tavern is your neighborhood hub for casual eats, drinks, and good times
Groups & Parties

From customized menus to table settings, we'll handle all the details so you can focus on enjoying the occasion.

Reviews
Start stop reviews carousel 
Review by - Google

Victoria L:
five star review by 
The best new bar in chs, great place to watch sports and fantastic bar food!! Somewhere we will be going at least once every week!

Review by - Google

Casy V:
five star review by 
This place is absolutely awesome! Everything was on point. The owners are phenomenal as well!

Review by - Google

Jason L:
five star review by 
Cool spot to watch sports, hang out with friends or shoot pool. Food was pretty good, the service was great and the atmosphere is classy but relaxed/casual. Excited to go back here again!
